5.Calculate the subnet mask,network address
I want to create a subnet and with maximum 100000 host
192.168.0.0

we can't have subnet mask for 100000 hosts

*********************
ip:192.168.0.0
11000000.10101000.00000000.00000000
maximum 100000 host -2*17
11111111.11111110.00000000.00000000 -MASK-/15
255.255.255.128
11000000.10101000.00000000.00000000 - NETWORK
192.168.0.0

0 0.00000000.00000000 - network
1 0.00000000.00000000 - mask
  1.11111111.11111111
  0-1 . 0-255 . 0-255
    
 (0-1)*(0-255)*(0-255) -  possibilities
 131072 possibilities
 
11000000.10101001.11111111.11111111
192.169.255.255 - broadcast address

131072-2(network address and actual address)
131070 Available ip address

192.168.0.1 - 192.169.255.254
    **********************************************

ip:192.168.0.0
11000000.10101000.00000000.00000000
maximum 100000 host -2*16
11111111.11111111.00000000.00000000 -MASK-/15
255.255.255.128
11000000.10101000.00000000.00000000 - NETWORK
192.168.0.0

00.00000000.00000000 - network
11.00000000.00000000 - mask
  .11111111.11111111
  . 0-255 . 0-255
    
 (0-255)*(0-255) -  possibilities
 65536 possibilities
 
11000000.10101000.11111111.11111111 - broadcast address
192.168.255.255

65536-2(network address and actual address)
65534 Available ip address

192.168.0.1 - 192.168.255.254
